message: Since one of the best parts of Pownce was the Friday Night Pownce Drinking Club (a.k.a. FNPDC), I think we need to christen the launch of Convore with a good ol' bit of drinking, chatting and general tomfoolery to celebrate!  Obviously, it's still morning for some of us...but FNPDC knows no time zone! Get to gettin!
I'm in the right timezone now! Yesssss! Out with friends tonight, but next week for sure :-p
I'll be going out tonight but I'll try to check in later on in the evening.  They need a mobile app!!!
Hey - you don't have to be here for the whole thing! Just stop in and say "hi"!
*jumps in* HI! *jumps out* Hopefully I'll be around this evening to enjoy the festivities!
I hope to join as well. When are things getting started?
Starting early for me. Hooray for beer!
@cym0n it starts when you say it does! I'll be checking in ~8pm Central.
I have to work tonight, so everyone have a drink for me. Also, I'm with @herbg , I'd love to see a mobile app for the site.
Time for Netflix streaming and beer!
I supposed I should be sociable. haha.
Well, after doing it once, you won't need them there for the next one...lol
Watching the hoopla over my brother's wedding just proved to me how much I really just didn't want one.
Are you telling me there's no drinkers out there tonight?
I've resorted to guilting people on twitter. :)
@blogkitten maybe they're just passed out at their keyboards already >.<
I have a birthday party to attend :D
If I feel like I need my family there, I won't tell my family why they're coming over for a barbecue. Just show up, and SURPRISE! Five minutes later, it's done, and we can eat.
it's cheaper to get married on a Friday than Saturday :)
so wait how did you guys find out about this place?
This is a better turnout than I ever get when I try.
Well, I'm swinging by Menlo Park to pick up HM, and then we're going to San Francisco for the day.
I've been once, when an old professor was in the area. HM is now aware that I haven't explored much, so he pretty much says I have no excuse anymore now that I have someone to go with. Haha.
It's a pretty nice place to visit.
Yeah...a whole lotta money spent and in the end you're just as married as if you spent $100 on a courthouse wedding
well...we haven't scheduled the chapel yet...but most likely May 6th.
I hate the internet. It's never going to catch on.
I was worried I missed the party
Hola! I need a picture, it seems...
you're just a cheeky monkey now!
so how did the "Awesome Dinner" turn out?
It was, in fact, quite awesome.
Okay. haha. Harvard Man is the guy I started seeing in early January. We'd been emailing back and forth for a couple of months before that.
and things are going well thusfar?
He's currently getting his PhD in math from Stanford...I have the .edu to prove it
And yes, I think it's going well - he just asked me to be exclusive, so...yes, I think it's working in my favor.
It's all very unexpected, but he's kind of amazing.
Sorry...I've been a bit romantical lately
wedding planning and all that stuff
haha, I was just going to say, with the whole "wedding" thing, I think I'd be "romantical," too.
I tell ya - eloping is brilliant
Hey, that works. That's ideal for me.
yeah now I need to get a beer
Erin and I were chatting so much
I'm down on the couch...Tim's upstairs
I see. It made its rounds really quick. A bunch of old pownce people found it that were not on Twitter
and now Tim's on the couch
So, where the hell is Dawson?
it's been like this for an hour
well..."planning" is more of "buying tickets to Vegas"
Congrats! When is the date? Or still figuring out that too?
I'm friends with Leah on Twitter
the world wide web will overtake it
hahaa my wife and I do it all the time
this works well for this type of applicaiton
Tim's on the couch next to me yelling at his iPad "not 'falcon'...'CAPCOM'!"
It should be. :) He's got good taste in entertainment. It's all kind of spontaneous, but I haven't gotten to be spontaneous lately. Should be fun.
the keys are so soft and hugable
All this chatting is really making me wish I was at home, not at work.  Blerg.
Aaron, I'll drink part of this glass for you
I think I can only manage one drink tonight...I have to be up early to drive up north.
I was trying to think of something witty, but I failed.
I'll refrain from the "and I'll form the head" jokes.
No idea why I find this so hilarious.
random question: what noise does zebra make? horse noise?
My friends are way better alcoholics than me. They make their own bitters and share with me.
aw...near dead laptop battery and working tomorrow morning...I gotta turn in for the night
Oh, screw you, Baskin Robbins, and your commercials for ice cream cake.
So glad I only have to deal with the one. At least I have my weekends.
@phntm42 I have one coworker that is remote that I feel like that constantly...and the other person, well, I'm thankful I only sit in meetings for two or three hours a week with her.
Nice! I have never been to sf before....on my list of places to go
I've never been to CA myself
well, we all knows who fault that is
holy crap. turn away for a bit and there's 90 new messages.
ran out of beer. had to switch to rum
Dawson needs to show his butt up on here too
i hadn't heard of Convore until it launched earlier in the week...but yeah, it's Leah's project
I do miss being up all night though kinda
@blogkitten Yeah didn't you start this group on the launch day?
I was totally social with my late nights. Granted it was at a Waffle House, and I was social with bums.
as long as I become a featured user :P
I'm also glad people are ignoring Tim's snazzy boxer shorts recommendations
only because I'm sitting 3 feet away
Jaysus! Has everyone but me gotten one of those?!?
Yeah, they just started re shipping
No. No one thinks Brendan Fraser has a sweet ass.
going through animal book with son
Oh, shoot, forgot @blogkitten was there with you
1/3rd of the FNPDC is on the same couch
I accidentally became a featured user
well, at least you didn't beg to become one! ;)
Although, I'm sitting here watching Tim stream Blaz Blue game videos to the hacked Apple TV
and listening to him exclaim how "sexy" the game is
I had his hair...in Encino Man
I just found out what they were!
sure.....watch us bring the servers and storage to their knees
had 503 errors all day at work today. was bitched at alllll day long.
i'm doing my part with the rum. it's the pirate in me.
we feel your pain, Aaron. I don't miss my later shift work.
So this works well on phones?
@cym0n yes - I figured someone needed to co-op Pownce on a new platform...lol
Hey I was an awesome featured user! mostly...
Heh, they would never have featured me. ;)
I'm not even the one posting pics of my drawers people :P
can I hug the chainsaw armed bear?
@mistahsnart you don't even know their names
I am now also out of drink.
We'd need an uber foodie like @nickdawson here to confirm that...
Soooo.... anyone else watching concert footage of Jam Project performing anime theme music in Tokyo?
...I just felt awkward, so I drank
I'm not sure who brings more awkward....Lewis or Tim
GOING TO GET MY DRANK ON!
@cym0n have you done anything to your cr48 yet? Leaving it stock?
I'm thinking about a second job..at least thru summer
1/6th of it is on my recliner...
at least I can make minimal contributions to the message count on my EVO  :D
I got featured for like a week then they shut it down :-(
FYI guys: get these to impress the special lady on V Day. http://store.voltron.com/ProductImages/Boxer_Resize_Brighten.jpg
my movie is over. now what?
O_O The jealous. I has it.
Pretty sure that's just you right now, Tim.
Looks delicious, was it worth the watch?
I love being an uncle. I get to corrupt 5 newphews.
@mikelewis stock for now. prob do ubuntu once 11.04 comes out
i wish i could find a part time at home job
Drinking game. Anytime I create an awkward moment, we drink.
I'll be drunk in 10 minutes, then.
I don't think I have enough alcohol in the house to play this game
I'm not gay, but that kid from Twilight has a sweet ass.
i bet they taste like chicken
i just like drinkin, so i drank
It's been pretty spot-on in its recommendations for me.
inbox on mondays with all of it is about 600+
he actually didn't want his email marked as read.. ever.
he was forced into retirement a few months later.
I have a special folder that all the spam email goes to
my head exploded at the thought.
Awww, who's going to supply our awkward now?
My copy is autographed. It looks like this '                          '
see you all in the tubes
I thought he was Encino Man
Zebras sound like zebras, I'd guess.
it's like you're right there; pressed between two sweaty japanese kids yelling 'yatta!' and swinging their glowsticks
it was pretty awesome. netflix said we'd like it because we liked mirrormask, amelie and big fish. they were right.
especially awesome if you like listening to kids try to tell stories
they do say the darndest things...
kids are fine so long as you can give them back to their parents.
it would be accurate/ I'm the one causing it!
I wish I could throw all the emails from my manager into my spam folder.
I'm also waiting, but I thought about doing some terminal work to get a tmobile sim to work.
working from home gets lonely sometimes
The only at home jobs in Richmond unfortunately are pimps.
oh you can do that? dang I should look into that
you would make a great pimp
So far only AT&T sims work...
oh, you mean being a pimp? I make a terrible pimp...
sometimes i miss working in an office. but then i remember i hate people.
@phntm42 you need to become masochistic to work in most office environments.
i'd strangle half my co-workers if i had to deal with them in person more than once a year
Every time there's a pause, we should just blame Lewis.
HA. @phntm42, that's pretty much my main complaint about going in even 3 days a week
I only leave important ones unread so I know to come back to them. Everything else...well, it gets filed away and out of my sight
yeah he asked me and told me to meet him on something called chat roulette
welp gang. that's all I've got
so I have to filter them or I would go nuts
99% of it is shit that doesn't apply to what I'm working on, or "Did you think about this?" Er, no, it's only my job to already have that covered...
i cant work from home too much because my boys don't understand that I need to work and not play
it's not a flaw, it's a feature.
Those poor zebras. They don't know your evil. Look in their innocent brown eyes as you sin.
i was stuck acting as tech support for a while. the cfo calls me up needing help with his email. "when i read my email, it marks it as read" "uh... yeah?"
went away on vacation for a week. 2000+ emails. all system notices though
@schrodingercat you're young. you'll build up your tolerance eventually.
time to go watch you tube videos of video games and pretend I'm not a pathetic nerd.
I'm totally OCD with my emails..
I am off to pass out.
Hey, anyone ever read 'A Brief History of Time'?
Has @mikelewis awkwardly asked anyone to cyber yet?
sigh. only had a shot of soco & lime and i'm done
all righty. Everyone's abandoning ship, and it's still early on the West coast :'(
Well this FNPDC looks like it might be coming to an end.....
Just as well...I still have to shower and get some sleep.
Looks like I picked the wrong time to drop in. I guess we'll just have to pick it back up next week.
Holy mackerel! I missed an epic FNPDC!!!!
@herbg yes you did, sir. Hopefully, with this new site, there will be many more to come :)
YEAH! Way to go on the 300+ badge Powncers!
